project.name: PromptArchive Frontend
project.description: Next.js web app for storing, organizing, and sharing AI prompts

tasks.title: Final Verification
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of all functionality after migration.
tasks.verification: All tests pass: Login/Register, Route protection, Prompt CRUD, Folder operations (including drag-and-drop), Tag operations, AI tools, Version history, Prompt sharing, Gallery browsing, Search and filtering, Keyboard shortcuts, Mobile responsiveness, Error boundaries, Build succeeds, No TypeScript errors, No ESLint errors
